long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Multilingual Knowledge at your fingertips. Ever wondered how to most easily query a large ontology, a taxonomy, a multilingual terminology database?
Now lookup terms and concepts, get a preview and navigate right to the found concept in Coreon's Multilingual Knowledge System. As a Coreon customer this extension allows you to easily query for a term - in any of your languages - and get a preview of the results. Fast and always available as a button in your browser's toolbar.
With this extension your multilingual knowledge graph - representing both the language and the knowledge system of your organisation - is reachable in a fast and most user friendly way.
